requestBody.title: Customer one books primary offer API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Churn Risk and Reactivation Playbooks. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.title: Customer one books primary offer API Trace
